resources.string: Prioritized work will be prioritized over other work.
Send a disciple to investigate to know the danger of a specific location.
This is a Secret that can only be completed by entering the map
Set the filter for main material. Filter is set to any by default.

The highest skill rating among a group of characters.
Click to check Feng Shui layout
The Integrity of the Secret body is less than 50%, the Secret Body has been crippled.
Secret body Integrity Determined by the Health of all parts on the Secret Body. If Integrity fell below 50%, the Secret Body would be crippled.
The Integrity of the Secret body is less than 50%, the Secret Body has been crippled.
Enter the Gear Page to configure the usage of Secret Bodies.

The character will randomly initiate the planned Remold in everyday cultivation. When the Remold results are of little importance or only contain unimportant labels, Tempered will be automatically chosen.
When the Remold is complete, if all the results are of little importance or have no important labels, it will automatically choose Tempered.
Keep Remolding until there are insufficient materials.
Keep Remolding until there are insufficient materials.
Breathing arrangement allows Physical cultivators to automatically perform Breathing at the planned hours without initiating Remold.
Click to check Feng Shui layout
Equip characters with axes to improve their efficient when chopping wood.
Nine words Nine words Nine words
Pop up a separate window to prompt this message.
Pop up a separate window to prompt info regarding this character's growth.
Outer Disciples in your sect will do foundation training when they've got spare time.
Outer Disciples in your sect will do foundation training when they've got spare time.
Outer Disciples in your sect will do foundation training when they've got spare time.
Outer Disciples in your sect will do foundation training when they've got spare time.
Outer Disciples in your sect will do foundation training when they've got spare time.
The highest skill rating among a group of characters.
The highest skill rating among a group of characters.
The number of times of Thinkings before it was forgotten.

Three Thoughts of the same type can be synthesized into the corresponding [color=#0000ff]Rationality[/color]/[color=#ff3300]Perception[/color]/[color=#1bd1a5]Realization[/color]. Thoughts will be cleared after each Thinking. Thoughts in the Memories slots and acquired [color=#0000ff]Rationality[/color]/[color=#ff3300]Perception[/color]/[color=#1bd1a5]Realization[/color] will also be forgotten as the number of times of Thinkings increases.

Consume three Thought Shards with the same keyword to gain a whole Thought. If no Thought Shards were used, no Thought would be generated. After Thinking, all unremembered Thought Shards will be forgotten. Both Memories and Thought could be forgotten after multiple Thinkings.

Automatically generates over time. When their number reaches 40, it will need Thinking in order to start the auto-generating again, which causes them to be forgotten as well. They can also be obtained by Observing, but the same Thought Shard can only be obtained once through Observing.
You can memorize a number of Thought Shards into Memories. Memorized Thought Shards will not be forgotten immediately after Thinking, they will only be forgotten after a certain number of Thinkings.
Synthesized by three Thought Shards of the same type. This action need to be performed in the Thought and Thinking menu.
The number of times of Thinkings before it was forgotten.
Move this Thought into the Memories pool.
Use three Thought Shards with the same keyword to start Thinking, after which you will gain a whole Thought.
Forget this Thought from the Memories pool.
[color=#FF0000]This Thought Shard is not self-generated, only one may be obtained.[/color]
Manual Pavilion Capacity: The Manual Pavilion's ability to contain manuals. A more difficult manual will take up more space after being transcribed.
Only shows manuals that can be learned.
No response timeout. Click to try again.
Select and extract items on the Display <font color=#D06508>[to extract item type]</font></font> Bone, Elixir, Medicine, Rock, Stone, Metal, Metal Bar, Wood, Timber, Meat.
The highest skill rating among a group of characters.
The highest skill rating among a group of characters.
Write a description for your reincarnator.

Yaoguai in half-human forms will face Shapeshifting Tribulation after a period of time. Those who succeed will shapeshift into human forms, while those who fail will be reversed to their original appearances. The stronger they are, the sooner the tribulation would come.
This area cannot include any more disciples.
Saw two (villagers)/(rich young lords) arguing; it seems to be about who is the owner of the land.
In the middle of a drought! Remaining Days: 10
Exploration progress of surrounding locations. 100% means that you have explored every nearby location.
Upgrade to Intermediate Main Hall to unlock Treasure Hunting Direction. Once applied, use different methods in Treasure Hunt will yield different treasures.
Stability: Suspicious Dominant Religion: Sunshade Abode
Population of Followers: Increased via different policy events. The higher the appeal, the more the increased followers. Without any policy, the region will lose 5% followers every day.
Watch: Pay close attention to this place, which increases the frequency of policy events, but also double the cost.
Incorporate: Incorporate all the other religions in this area. Incorporation is available when our followers exceed 70% of the total population.

Belief: Beliefs can be acquired every day in this area. More followers mean more beliefs can be acquired per day. If the stability is lower than Distrusting, hatred will begin accumulating. Beliefs can be gathered by dispatching inner disciples here. Beliefs will be transformed into an equal amount of Inspiration for non-Shendao cultivators.
General Stats: The abbot's stats combined with 10% of all disciples' stats.
The agent's stats are combined with 10% of disciples'.
Population of Followers: Increased via different policy events. The higher the appeal, the more the increased followers.
Watch: Pay close attention to this place, which increases the frequency of policy events, but also double the cost.
Stability: Suspicious Dominant Religion: Sunshade Abode
The abbot is on their way...
Saw two (villagers)/(rich young lords) arguing; it seems to be about who is the owner of the land.
Production Wood *10, Rock *20 Treasure Hunting: Purple Ganoderma, Phoenixwood
Saw two (villagers)/(rich young lords) arguing; it seems to be about who is the owner of the land.
Exploration progress of surrounding locations. 100% means that you have explored every nearby location.
Can enter if an inner disciple is at this location. Demi-God can directly descend upon this place.

[color=#ff0000]Supports most UBB Code and HTML tags.[/color]Common Special Tags: [NAME] Player character's full name. [ITS] Player character's possessive pronoun, e.g. his or her. [IT] Player character's pronoun, e.g. he or she. [HENAME] Target unit's full name. [HIS] Target unit's possessive pronoun, e.g. its, his or her. [HE] Target unit's pronoun, e.g. it, he or she. [LUA=XXXX] Lua script result. [MY_PROPERTY=属性名|格式化文本] Player character's stats.
Usable scripts. Result is Boolean data type. Failed test will be shown as Not Selectable.
LUA Special Variable: me: Player Character (luahelper) meobj: Player Character (thing) target: Target Character (thing)
Content (Use || to separate multiple random contents)
Content (Use || to separate multiple random contents)
Hide talk menu when running scripts.
This step will use in-game CPU FPS, can be paused.
Show test script. Result is Boolean data type. Failed test will not be shown or randomly assigned.
me: Player Character (luahelper) meobj: Player Character (thing) target: Target Character (thing)
Run script. Load script when running this node.
A seed used for the same map size will generate an identical map in different playthroughs.

Immortal presents the ultimate experience. You have only one save slot in an Immortal playthrough. Your game also auto-saves at fixed intervals. You can check your statistics and complete achievements. Some tips will be hidden. Immortal tests your understanding of the game to its limits. This mode is designed for true Immortals!
Play through the tutorial to learn the ropes.
Start your own journey toward immortality.
Create brand new game content using our mod tools, or download content created by other players.

What has happened to the ascended founder in the realm of immortals? What happened to all the disciples banished from the sect? Where did all the dead fellow disciples end up? See all the secret events in Epilogues.
Contains all phenomena, everything there is.
Edit adventure maps. Create your own single-player adventure with rich contents and share it with your friends!
抵制不良游戏，拒绝盗版游戏。 注意自我保护，谨防受骗上当。 适度游戏益脑，沉迷游戏伤身。 合理安排时间，享受健康生活。
Amazing Cultivation Simulator's official Weibo account
Amazing Cultivation Simulator's official QQ chat group

Deep in the Bamboo Forest[DLC]\nIn the world of immortality seekers, a great event has unfolded: an ancient, out-of-this-world land named the Great Bamboo Forest has been discovered by some especially adventurous cultivators. It's a land full of new resources: gather tasty bamboo shoots for cooking, and cut down bamboo stalks to construct buildings of various styles, or to make fishing rods! And don't forget the cute, mysterious creatures that lurk within: the PANDAS!

Immortal Tales of Wudang[DLC] On the East Sea, a misty fairy mountain suddenly appeared in the cultivation world. Occasionally, a cultivator came to explore it and found that it was a long lost fairyland, in which there was a sect of seclusion Taoism! This sect's Taoist unification is no small matter. It is the direct descendant of the Perfected Warrior. His disciples preach the mystery and get the essence of slaying devils. This fairyland is called Wudang Mountain!
Saving the game... Don't quit the game while it is saving.

Switch Yin & Yang Inspiration required to learn Fire or Wood manuals is based on Yang Spirit Attainment. Inspiration required to learn Metal or Water manuals is based on Yin Spirit Attainment. Inspiration required to learn Earth or undefined manuals is based on the lesser Spirit Attainment.
This key is bound to a system function.
Use this selection to try to uncover the truth.
Select the motive for the mystery.
Select the participant for the mystery.
Evidence Type: M The motive. P The participant. E The evidence
Emotional Guard: Before the character lowers their guard down, their favor will be no more than 60, and they will not reveal the most important information.

Talk about their weakness to help lower their guard down. When a character becomes cautious, their favor will increase at a slower pace, while any decrease will double. The success rate of any interaction will be reduced to half.
The predestiny between the character and the player's character. The better it is, the higher the character's initial belief will be as the core follower of the Shendao cultivator.
Talk to and get to know each other to find out useful information.
Select different topics to discuss with the other person.
More interactions, such as giving gifts, invitation, etc.
The agent is on the way...
Exploration progress of surrounding locations. 100% means that you have explored every nearby location.
Can enter if an inner disciple is at this location. Demi-God can directly descend upon this place.
Access to this location has yet to be unlocked. The character will be attacked by sages for forced entry.
Food needed to be fully functional.
Select gears to be refined and your desired entry.

After the cultivator gains their primordial spirit and any sub-spirit, they can attach their epiphany of cultivation to their gears via sub-spirits. After the attachment, the cultivator will lose this part of their memories, but that will also open a wider space for their growth.
The character's state of the primordial spirit.

Matching: The better an item matches the character, the fewer sub-spirits it will cost. Matching is affected by the following factors. -Element of the item and the character. -How long the item has been equipped. -The state of the primordial spirit. -The item tier. -The power of the attached stats.
Any common items can be crafted into an artifact on the crafting table. According to the different types of the items, the crafted artifacts will have different stats.
Legacy artifacts crafted through special methods will have more powerful properties than randomly crafted artifacts.
A cultivator with the primordial spirit can use a sub-spirit as the carrier to attach their understanding of cultivation to their equipment.
Your photo has to be .png or .jpg, and less than 1 MB.
Publish local mods in the Realms Palace.
This mod may cause errors in the game.
To use mods, please put them in the mods folder in the game path.
Unable to connect to the Mod Store. Please check your internet connection!
This mod may cause errors in the game.
No record found in the timeline of this realm.
No background chosen for main character.
Primordial Souls can only be created when one's spell power reaches the highest level. The spell of selecting Primordial Souls will be automatically released during battle.
Physical cultivators will remember their sufferings deeply, which can be recalled through a Furious Berserk to improve their power.
If an Outer Disciple skip their daily training routine, their Foundation will be reduced by 1k.
Outer Disciples in your sect will do foundation training when they've got spare time.
The current location's coziness grants a bonus to your cultivation. You gain a bigger bonus by using higher-level materials.
The environment's Qi density grants a bonus to your cultivation.
Effect of character's mood on cultivation.
Effect of character's Mental State on cultivation.
How well the environment's elemental attribute matches the Law.
Cultivation bonus provided by the character's master.
How well the character's main stats and the cultivation Law matches.
Effect of current season on cultivation.

Condemnation/Virtue: Affected by the character's action. Characters who the Heaven harbors much enmity toward will have to survive stronger tribulation. Characters who have done many virtuous deeds will face weaker tribulation. Condemnation and Virtue can cancel each other out.
Inner Disciples will automatically consume food for a constant supply of Stamina.
Prioritize the consumption of helpful elixirs such as [Elixir of Condensed Qi].
Characters with high mental state will gain beliefs at a faster rate.
Characters with more divinity will gain beliefs at a slower rate.
Characters with low distress will gain beliefs at a faster rate.
Characters with a high-tier sacred relic will gain beliefs at a faster rate.
Attempt to discover new recipes by eating all kinds of food.
Growth Growth: 30% or below is Child Stage, 30%–100% is Learning Stage, and anything above is Mature Stage.
Blessed/Cursed Tendency: The pet's degree of good or evil. Training styles applied on different pet behaviors will directly affect its Blessed/Cursed Tendency.
Fatness: Different behaviors and eating habits will affect the pet's fatness.
Physique: Different behaviors and eating tendencies will affect the pet's physique.
The higher the Qi of the location, the higher the efficiency of gaining essence from Breathing.
The higher the mood, the higher the efficiency of gaining essence from Breathing.
Bonus from extra sources such as Secret Bodies that are applied to the efficiency of gaining essence from Breathing.
The longer the Breathing takes place in the same position, the better the effect would be.
An eureka moment can happen at any time. It depends on a character's actions, as well as a bit of luck.
I have no clue how to cultivate.
Synthesized by three Thought Shards of the same type. This action need to be performed in the Thought and Thinking menu.
The highest skill rating among a group of characters.

Yaoguai in half-human forms will face Shapeshifting Tribulation after a period of time. Those who succeed will shapeshift into human forms, while those who fail will be reversed to their original appearances. The stronger they are, the sooner the tribulation would come.
Generate a character with random stats. You can edit their name later on.
Summon a special character by entering a predetermined name and gender. They are unusually powerful characters, but you can't change their name and background.
Priority Orders given will be carried out according to the preset priority order.
Leave the fight and attempt to flee. (Hotkey: [keycode]RunAway[/keycode])

Head to a designated location (right-click to cancel). When outside of battle, characters will move after completing their current task. If engaged in a battle, the character will move immediately. (Hotkey: [keycode]Moveto[/keycode])
Lock camera and open focus window.
Form formations with this character as the pillar.
Arr.(Breathing Arrangement) allows Physical cultivators to automatically go to their respective cushions to perform Breathing at the planned hours.
The brain cannot automatically generate Thoughts anymore, you need to complete a Thinking in order for it to resume.
Lock camera and open focus window.

All effects will commence when the Secret Body is activated. On this basis, the Physical cultivator will use the Secret Body here to launch an attack. If the previous Secret Body misses, it will try the next one.
Characters will get hurt if they live in temperatures exceeding their tolerance.
Radius of a character's perception of their surroundings.
Maximum moving speed on solid ground.

Reflects a cultivator's overall ability. Characters with high Attainment have a more difficult time learning new abilities and they suffer from increasing Inspiration costs. Attainment is unavailable for the Law of Shendao.

Yang Attainment The inspirations needed by learning fire and wood manuals is determined by Yang Attainment. The inspirations needed by learning metal and water manuals is determined by Yin Attainment. The inspirations needed by learning earth manuals is determined by the fewer between Yin and Yang Attainment.

Yin Attainment The inpirations needed by learning fire and wood manuals is determined by Yang Attainment. The inpirations needed by learning metal and water manuals is determined by Yang Attainment. The inpirations needed by learning earth manuals is determined by the fewer between Yin and Yang Attainment.

A private residence left by this realm's first-ever ascended immortal named Nangong, hidden inside the blessed abode between heaven and sea. Without the guidance of a secret path, nobody will be able to find this place.
Please use [Invite] or [Random] to select a challenger.
Unload current character Summon, Heaven Echo, Compile can only be used after Heaven Link.
Invite a character by Spirit Carve
Crystalize Spirit stones, gain spirit stones by battle.
After Heaven Echo opened, the Heaven Echo Altar will Crystalize some spirit stones periodically. You can gain spirit stones after winning battles with enemies.
Selected stats will be modified in batch.
After ticked, this action will become a default operation. When the interact button is pressed, if all the items selected only have this action, this action will happen.
Fog reloading time. Unable to modify when fog is open.
Set an ecological environment. Please enter a name for it.
Fog reloading time. Unable to modify when fog is open.
If selected, game generates a random basic map. Otherwise, it will be an empty map.
A seed used for the same map size will generate an identical map in different playthroughs.
Map will have no fogs if fog is turned off.
Fog reloading time. Unable to modify when fog is open.
Set an ecological environment. Please enter a name for it.
Map will have no fogs if fog is turned off.
Custom avatar picture. Selected picture will be used as avatar.
Modify map description. Character limitation will be shown in tips.
Modify map content. Content may change during actual gameplay.
Give up this round of auction.
Give up the rest auction items.
*Statistics and achievements are only recorded in Immortal.
Sync achievement data between the platform and your local saves.
Sync achievement data between the platform and your local saves.
Estimated reachable highest state of this limit

Core Shaping is the process where a cultivator condenses their Qi into a golden core. Once having entered the phase, the cultivator will become unable to replenish their Qi. The cultivator's Qi will continue to be consumed during the formation of the core and when their Qi is depleted, this phase ends.

In order to Breakthrough, this cultivator must leave their sect, and find their inner calling through the trials of the real world. A socially awkward cultivator may find this challenging since it tests a cultivator's social skill and charisma.

When trying to break into this state, a cultivator will lose all of their magic powers and attainments. In order to breakthrough, they must find enlightenments in everyday trivia and rediscover their true self.

Core Shaping is the process where a cultivator condenses their Qi into a golden core. Once having entered the phase, the cultivator will become unable to replenish their Qi. The cultivator's Qi will continue to be consumed during the formation of the core and when their Qi is depleted, this phase ends.

A Heavenly Tribulation is about to befall the cultivator. They shall prepare for it before the time is up. Once begun, the Heavenly Tribulation won't stop. A tribulation gone wrong may make a cultivator's past efforts come to naught, or even obliterate their entire existence.

The final state of cultivation, where a cultivator is free to embrace the oblivion and finally ascend toward immortality. If they choose to remain in the physical plane, thunders of tribulation will befall them periodically with increasing intensity. The cultivator can remain in their sect by surviving tribulations or they can choose to ascend at any time.
This cultivator has reached the culmination of this cultivation Law and cannot proceed any further.
Embrace oblivion and ascend toward immortality.
Survived Tribulations The longer an accomplished cultivator chooses to remain in the physical plane, the more intense the thunders of tribulation will be.
If checked, your screenshot will be submitted to the devs.
Uploading report / saving the game. This may take several minutes.
If checked, HUD will be hidden in the screenshot.
The secret of the Taiyi sect Massacre? The deep secret all sects hiding? The universe in the mini universe? Try to solve all the secret and unveil the truth.

It is an ancient story, that the tier one golder core if far from the limit for profound sects and peerless gifted cultvators. If you can create a golden core high than tier one, you surely can make an impact on the world!

The ancient dragon forbidden area of Longtai reappeared. People went to look for opportunities. But no one expected that the formation used to seal the fierce Phoenix, the great enemy of the dragon clan, had also been inadvertently destroyed by people who knew nothing about it. It is said that the fierce Phoenix was originally a auspicious beast in ancient times. After killing and robbing, it became nirvana. After waking up again, it was already in a frenzy. Its fierce power was unparalleled. It even ate dragons. It was also the most fierce existence in ancient times when there were many strong people. Now the fierce Phoenix is recovering again. Although its strength is not one in ten, it may also be a catastrophe in the world...

With the recovery of the Qi of heaven and earth, the dragon egg sealed in the mountains of the moon wheel in ancient times hatched again. The newly hatched dragon opened up the earth's surface with magical powers and wanted to help it recover by enslaving creatures on the earth's surface with miracles.

The torch dragon was originally the manifestation of the way of yin and Yang in the world. It has returned to the Tao since ancient times. Now, the increasingly fierce dispute between good and evil once again disrupts the avenue of yin and Yang. Affected by this Qi machine, the real body of the torch dragon is again manifested in the world in a chaotic form.
Many ancient cultivators comes out, the cultivation realm becomes unstable now. These ancient sages are skillful and powerful, with unique treasures. Conquer them, gain your fame!

Direct descendant of the way of Supreme Clarity in the mortal realm. Located at the top of Mt. Sunshade, it is a pillar in the world of just. The Sunshade Abode excels at artifact crafting. All ten of the Divine Swords they keep in their sect as a deterrence are finest weapons of unparalleled quality, being tier ten or above.

The ancient sect of the Southern Cult, consisting mostly of savages from the Southern Frontier. They are very evil and brutal, often committing crimes in the world of cultivators that are too horrific to tell.

A sect that actively participates in secular affairs, known for their experienced reading of Feng Shui. The sect principle is to practice Taoist virtues by going on adventures. Their disciples seek immortality, but also act like travelling warriors, most of which wander around the world by reading Feng Shui and telling fortune.
An evil sect based on the Reunion Isle. Its main disciples are all females, known to the rest of the world for their skilled extraction of Qi from men.

Reclusive sect located at the Heavenstep Peak, it only accept beautiful men and women as disciples. They practice a secret Law in which one embrace their emotions and passion in the process of cultivation, but then throw them all away in order to approach a supreme state, leaving numerous languishing men and women in the world of cultivators as a result.

Descendant of the way of Jade Clarity passed down from the Primordial Lord. Proudly located at the foot of Mt. Kunlun, the ancestral dragon veins of fortune, it is a pillar in the world of just. The Jade Purity Immortal Law sought by the Kunluns are known for its vigorous power. With a large number of disciples, it is considered the greatest of just sects.

Evil sect located at Mt. Pitfall that believe in the Earthmother. Way of Dual Extremities is the ultimate technique in the sect's secret codex. It allows one to harness the Qi of Metamagnet deep inside the earth's crust and incorporate it into their body to form a strong magnetic field. Anyone not following the same Law will be negatively affected if coming within 300 meters, feeling extremely uncomfortable and Qi flow disturbed. Thus this sect is extremely hard to infiltrate, and is mysterious even among cultivators.

The ultimate evil sect in today's world, mostly known among cultivators for their violent sword techniques. The sect buildings are similarly aggressive, with formidable sword formations lining around the sect.
Evenfall Abode is located on the bank of Celestial Pool in Mt. Nelumbo. Their disciples are skilled alchemists, known for their healing power and aloofness in the world of cultivators.
A secluded sect founded by the Blue Lotus Immortal, known for their mastery of sword that is used for killing. The sect principle is to live a liberated life.

A sect that actively participates in secular affairs. The national religion in the mortal realm and counselor of the emperor. The sect buildings all look luxurious and solemn, with purple as their basic color, displaying a sense of royalty. As the national religion, the sect has continuous followers.

On the East Sea, a lofty, hazy mountain of immortals suddenly appeared in the mortal world. Cultivators explored the place and found that it's a long-lost, boundless realm of immortals, and hidden within is a seclusive Taoist sect! The Taoist teachings of the sect are directly passed down from the Perfected Warrior. Its disciples have all mastered the essence of Tao and excel at expelling demons. The realm is known as the Wudang Mountains!
A huge faction of evil located deep in the Great Western Desert.
When selected, the character will automatically change their clothes according to current temperature.
After ticked, this character will always ride on the contract while moving.

All effects will commence when the Secret Body is activated. On this basis, the Physical cultivator will use the Secret Body here to launch an attack. If the previous Secret Body misses, it will try the next one.

All effects will commence when the Secret Body is activated. On this basis, the Physical cultivator will use the Secret Body here to defend an attack. If the previous Secret Body failed, it will try the next one.

All effects will commence when the Secret Body is activated. The Secret Body here will not participate in attacks nor defenses, instead it will keep operating indefinitely and provide their effects to buff the Physical cultivator.

Immortal presents the ultimate experience. The difficulty cannot be adjusted. You have only one save slot in an Immortal playthrough. Your game also auto-saves at fixed intervals. You can check your statistics and complete achievements. Some tips will be hidden. Immortal tests your understanding of the game to its limits. This mode is designed for true Immortals!
*You can increase the difficulty of your game at any time.
The level of difficult in Immortal.
Click to check Feng Shui layout
Open or close the minimap. Hotkey: [keycode]MinMap[/keycode]
You will unlock more suffixes as your sect grows.
Click to select a suffix for your sect. You will unlock more suffixes as your sect grows.
You can instantly create a talisman you've drawn before. Its quality will be 95% of your hand-drawn talisman's highest quality.
Remaining Times of Adventure Repetition. Recall to stop the repetition.
The range of power of the sect and its agency. The sect will be count as an ally force once conquered, or after you acquire over 40% of the population as followers and have the most popular religion.
Sprint forward for a distance. Ignores damage. (Hotkey: [keycode]Sprint[/keycode])
Requires a stove. Cooking orders will be automatically given out 2 hours before meal time.
When selected, deceased disciples will be shown.
To regulate the way your sect's disciples deal with different matters when they travel around the world.
Set the display mode for various sect messages.

One of the basic cultivation methods in the world, including 4 states and 16 different limits that require a step-by-step progress. It is not easy to reach a higher state in this Law, but it does not require much to begin with. You will make steadfast progress in cultivation, and immortality may eventually happen. One of the basic cultivation methods in the world, including 4 states and 16 different limits that require a step-by-step progress. It is not easy to reach a higher state in this Law, but it does not require much to begin with. You will make steadfast progress in cultivation, and immortality may eventually happen. One of the basic cultivation methods in the world, including 4 states and 16 different limits that require a step-by-step progress. It is not easy to reach a higher state in this Law, but it does not require much to begin with. You will make steadfast progress in cultivation, and immortality may eventually happen.
You can't change resolution while in a game.
Change the background and music in the main menu.
When selected, character names will be always shown on screen.
When selected, time of the mortal realm will be shown at the bottom-left corner.
When selected, a character's title will be shown below their name.
When checked, the game will still play sounds when running in background.
When enabled, grid lines will be shown when constructing buildings.
When enabled, greatly enhances the game's late-game performance. This feature is still under development and testing.
When enabled, thought bubbles will be shown when a character gets a new memory.
When enabled, the cursor will be locked within the window in game scenes. Only valid in windowed mode.
When enabled, it speeds up the process of saving game, but the size of saved files will be considerable larger.
Developer mode will active console(CTRL+F8) and Map Edit.
If overlapping targets are selected when this is activated, it will open a multi-target selection panel.
After this is activated, there will be a Swift Mode in the game speed list. In this mode time will flow swiftly.
HUD zoom will take effect after restarting the game.
Inspiration gain is affected by a character's mental state and their intelligence.

Orthodox Profundities The comprehensive summary of the profound ways of heaven made by the orthodox sects, which laid the foundation for all cultivators. Learning the secret manual of "Supreme Law" can increase this value.

Unorthodox Manual Unorthodox views on the profound ways of heaven by various sects from their own perspectives. Although defective in some ways, it can serve as a supplement to further enlighten yourself, given that you already have a solid base of orthodox foundation. Learning the secret manual of "Wild Law" can increase this value. In normal circumstances, this value cannot be greater than one fourth of the orthodox value.

Switch Yin & Yang Inspiration required to learn Fire or Wood manuals is based on Yang Spirit Attainment. Inspiration required to learn Metal or Water manuals is based on Yin Spirit Attainment. Inspiration required to learn Earth or undefined manuals is based on the lesser Spirit Attainment.
Priority Storage with higher priority will be used first.
No quality rating. Items such as food ingredients are usually without a quality rating.
Only large fish will be sorted into this storage.
Only relics will be sorted into this storage.
Items in this storage can be traded.
Use the keyboard or middle mouse button to adjust the camera.
在游戏中，角色与大部分物品发生交互均是采用命令指定的方式。 选择对应功能后根据屏幕提示选择正确的对象即可。
A tree commonly found in temperate forests. Suitable as a raw material for many things.
Attractiveness: Delightful Qi: 123456 Flammability: High Flammability: High Element: Wood

Mythological behemoths have awoken from their thousand-year slumber, and have set out to bring about death and carnage. Nevertheless, some cultivators have managed to find unprecedented opportunities in the looming perils. Seeking to protect their sect or hunt down the ancient beasts, mysterious elders and sages from sects all over China also leave their hermitage. Thusly have an era of great changes for all cultivators come!

The awakening of mythological beasts completely dislocates the cultivation realm. Struggles centering around these beasts are brewing among the sects; a storm is certainly brewing. A foreboding comet flashes across the sky and seeds of hatred are sprouting. There is no way out—so draw your sword and pave your own.

Struggling to recover in the aftermath of the war of cultivators, the sects now seek to bring in new blood and gather resources. They have begun to engage in the affairs of mortals, and have even appointed agents to handle mortal activities on behalf of the sect. Of course, when among the mortals, cultivators shall avoid showing off their superhuman abilities. A new kind of competition has begun among the sects, while they also get to know each other better.

A long-lost hallowed place for the wicked, the Dragon Cliff now reemerges with evil cultivation Laws inscribed on it. The time has come for the once-persecuted evil cultivators to rise, and for the Temple of Demons hidden in deep desert to reemerge.
All reincarnators (except for those revealed by the devs) are randomly generated. Please let us know if you have any questions.
